entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test failures on Android: error: device 'emulator-5556' not found #70056
  • Investigate removing gtSimdBaseJitType from GenTreeVecCon #70052
  • `genPutArgSplit` on ARM can load of bounds #70051
    7.0.0
  • Some System.Data abstraction types don't properly implement disposable pattern #70049
  • [Windows arm] JIT/stress/ABI/tailcall_d / do tests are non-deterministically failing several times a day #70042
    7.0.0
  • Implement mono support for default interface implementations of static virtual methods #70040
    7.0.0
  • [Breaking Change] X86 version of .NET host will not be added to PATH on 64-bit Windows platforms #70039
    7.0.0
  • Access Violation exception #70038
  • [wasm] ILLinker throws InvalidOperationException #70031
  • Getting No Names in regioninfo class on IOS #70028
    Future
  • In Debug HttpUtility.UrlDecode double-decodes while WebUtility.UrlDecode does not. #70018
  • Blazor wasm HttpClient ignores spaces at the end of URIs even if it is escaped (%20) #70025
  • [API Proposal]: System.Collections.Generic.StructuralComparisons<T> #70017
  • Process.CloseMainWindow does not work on MacOS #70014
  • What was the reason to inject DispatchTailCalls method after profiler instrumentation in .NET 7.0? #70013
    7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Linq.Expression interpreter tests crashing in Linux-ARM64 #70012
  • [Perf] Changes at 5/30/2022 5:18:40 PM #70019
  • [Perf] Changes at 5/30/2022 12:57:05 PM #70021
  • [Perf] Changes at 5/28/2022 1:41:21 AM #70022
  • [Perf] Changes at 5/23/2022 10:48:42 PM #70027
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Changes at 5/23/2022 7:50:08 PM #70029
  • [Perf] Changes at 5/30/2022 5:18:40 PM #70032
  • [NativeAOT] Enable Reflection library tests in Linux-ARM64 #70010
  • Process.ProcessName throws for services.exe when accessed from a non-admin user #70007
  • Missing docker image `fedora-34-helix-20220523150939-4f64125` in mcr #70005
  • [API Proposal]: Dependency Injection - Add explicit way of binding multiple interfaces to the same singleton instance #70004
    Future
  • Avoid duplicate cmp instruction, avoid boolean zero extension #70003
    Future
  • Print the qualified name for missing metadata type in exception message #69998
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Net.NameResolution.Tests.GetHostAddressesTest_Cancellation.DnsGetHostAddresses_PostCancelledToken_Throws #69993

Closed

  • LoggerMessage generator generates invalid code for a parameter #69893
  • EqualityComparer<TEnum?>.Default allocates #67842
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'endOffset > startOffset' during 'Emit GC+EH tables' #62250
    7.0.0
  • Allow GetProperties to order results by declaration order #46272
    7.0.0
  • .NET 6 strong name signing behavior breaks existing code. #69311
  • [wasm] random `memory access out of bounds` in `System.Xml.XmlSchemaSet.Tests` on linux #69934
    7.0.0
  • [release/7.0-preview5][wasm] Assertion failure in interpreter `src/mono/mono/mini/interp/interp.c:2114` #69864
  • API Proposal: Add platform independent API for System.Runtime.Intrinsics.VectorXXX #36480
    Future
  • Vector4 operator /(Vector4 value1, float value2) is not implemented as intrinsic #9734
    Future
  • RyuJIT SIMD GetItem Intrinsic optimization #6711
    Future
  • RyuJIT SIMD: Review SIMD API usage in Asp.Net Kestrel server #6741
    Future
  • Vector.Dot<float> is slower than trivial product and sum implementation (with repro) #4439
    Future
  • [libraries-pgo] Assertion failed 'asgNode->OperIs(GT_ASG)' in during 'Morph - Global' #69939
  • Many jobs are failing with a 401 response #69854
  • Regressions in MicroBenchmarks.Serializers.Xml_FromStream #70030
  • CultureInfo fr-CH, wrong NumberDecimalSeparator #70020
  • Debugger cannot evaluate when multiple event handlers was bound. #69849
  • [API Proposal]: System.Runtime.CompilerServices.MetadataUpdateOriginalTypeAttribute #66222
    7.0.0
  • Consider deleting CallingConventions.cs #67519
    Future
  • Crash of our NetCore 6 Application #67897
  • [NativeAOT] System.Reflection.Tests timeout/hang #69476
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json cannot bind to fields #69936
  • .net 6 Blazor wasm AOT Publish is very slow #69654
  • [NativeAOT] FijiTimeZoneTests Fails on NativeAOT #69801
    7.0.0
  • In NativeAOT, Null ref return throws NullReferenceException but should be wrapped in a TargetInvocationException #69755
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Support more primitive type converters #70057
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Move TypeReference.ToObject to managed (CoreCLR) #70055
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Ensure side effects get spilled for the various hwintrinsic and simdashwintrinsic nodes #70054
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make gcunsafe for cpblk if it has gc pointers #70053
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix runtime test failing due to the app running in debug mode #70050
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [LibraryImportGenerator] Use void* for array pinning #70048
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Optimize `System.Reflection.Metadata.ByteSequenceComparer`. #70047
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Fix SmtpClient reuse with SendAsync #70046
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • WIP: Svm diamond shape without mono exclusion #70045
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix flakyness of DnsGetHostAddresses_PostCancelledToken_Throws #70044
    area-System.Net
  • Cryptography.Pkcs.Tests: make tests pass when rsa+sha1 signing is not supported. #70041
    area-System.Security
  • Exclude GetTotalPauseDuration from GCStress #70037
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add ZipArchiveEntry.IsEncrypted for password-protection detection #70036
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Decouple TimeOnlyConverter from TimeSpanConverter #70035
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0-preview5] Refactoring the generic-math CreateChecked/Saturating/Truncating APIs to match API review #70034
    Servicing-consider, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix fgCanTailCallViaJitHelper #70033
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reenable 4244 warning for Mono. #70026
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • [Mono] Add retry mechanism to test execution process #70023
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Ensure we do not corrupt RAX for CFG dispatcher on x64 #70016
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Enable MsQuicTests.ConnectWithClientCertificate on Windows #70015
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix incorrect docker tack for fedora 34 helix image #70011
  • Implement DbDataSource #70006
    area-System.Data, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][debugger] Added Default Interface Method tests. #70002
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Reflection.Metadata.Tests: make tests pass when rsa+sha1 signing is not supported. #69999
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Use u8 in more places #69995
    area-Meta
  • Fix compilation error in VS 17.3.1 #69994
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Add special Comparer/EqualityComparer for Nullable<Enum> #68077
    area-System.Runtime
  • Temporarily disable tailcall_d / do on Windows arm with #70042 #70043
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove more wprintf usages #69912
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Keep native order of get members call from Type #69506
    area-System.Reflection
  • Adding support for vector constants via GenTreeVecCon #68874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix address adjustment in bundle unmap for macos universal binaries #69687
    area-Single-File
  • Change some delegate FCalls to managed #70000
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Optimize Array.GetFlattenedIndex (all runtimes) and InternalGetValue (CoreCLR) #69940
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Clean up emitOutputNOP #69989
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Split out and generalize tailcall IR validation/tailcall profile adjustments #69941
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve regex tests for offset start cases #69959
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Disable TarWriter_WriteEntry_File_Tests.Add_File in Linux #69997
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Cryptography.Xml.Tests: skip tests that require rsa+sha1 when platform doesn't support it. #69713
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Move off preview onto regular Windows 11 client images #69871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Mono] Pass Vector128 in SIMD registers, when LLVM is enabled #68991
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Reenable GetHostAddressesTest_Cancellation on Unix #70009
    area-System.Net
  • [mono] Fix diamond pattern encountered with static virtual interface methods #69738
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Mono] Fix 4244 warnings. #69236
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Android] Add UnmanagedCallersOnly attribute to SafeDeleteSslContext.ReadFromConnection/WriteToConnection methods #69507
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • [mono][doc] Update Android NDK version to r23c #69913
    documentation, area-Meta, os-android
  • Use `Random.XoshiroImpl` in the thread pool's hill climbing RNG. #69987
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Add MetadataUpdateOriginalTypeAttribute #69751
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix `--fulllog` in ILC/crossgen2 #69996
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete CallingConventions.cs #70001
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • CI fix for native aot tests #69571
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Change wording of exception #69957
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Store actual signature types in CallArg and normalize to that type #69969
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Annotate System.Runtime tests for NativeAOT #69803
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAot] Null ref return is wrapped in TargetInvocationException #69838
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Remove more uses of StringBuilderCache #69683
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0
  • Resumbmit tar feedback changes, include Android build fix #69469
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [Release/6.0] Fix singlefile bundle alignment on OSX ARM64 #69930
    Servicing-consider, area-Single-File, 6.0.x
  • Add hot/cold splitting test job to jit-runtime-experimental #69922
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add support for symbolicating traces via XHarness #66226
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • CoreCLR support for default interface implementation of static virtual methods #66887
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Improve Encoding.UTF8.GetMaxByte/CharCount perf #69910
    area-System.Text.Encoding, 7.0.0
  • Rooting `GT_COMMA` nodes for `GT_RETURN` nodes, then hoisting them to statements #69918
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Speed up Convert.ToBase64String() #69884
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Wasm AOT micro optimizations #69955
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Bug fixes from dead code elimination #69897
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve string.Format / {Value}StringBuilder.AppendFormat parsing throughput #69757
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix address adjustment in bundle unmap for macos universal binaries #69689
    area-Single-File
  • [release/7.0-preview5] Revert "[mono][interp] Add tiering within interpreter (#68823)" #69866
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • WIP: Cross module work #68919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix StreamReader EOF handling and improve perf #69888
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] JIT: Abandon loop search if we reach the end of the bbNext chain #69525
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.7
  • [Release/6.0] JIT: fix interaction of GDV and boxing (#60355) #69630
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.7
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Equals/GetHashCode for UnixDomainSocketEndPoint #69722
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #69041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger]Fix entrypoint breakpoint when it's an async method #69856
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Support array parameter types of custom attributes in Mono AOT compiler #69759
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Creating comma temps differently for SubMulDiv morph #69770
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • allow null TargetHost in SslClientAuthenticationOptions #69071
    area-System.Net.Security
  • PoC: support custom X509ChainPolicy in SslStream #69908
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement get bytes from loaded_files using debugger protocol. #69072
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Rev .NET 5 to net6.0 or $(NetCoreAppCurrent) #69911
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not add x86 host to PATH on 64-bit machines #69902
    area-Setup, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugging] Adding instructions for native debugging #69873
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Do not use `LEA`s in HIR #69992
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Implement UnixFileMode APIs #69980
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Enable server-side OCSP stapling on Linux #69833
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • avoid allocation of SafeFreeSslCredentials and SafeDeleteSslContext on Linux #69527
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • limit retries of EPROTOTYPE on macOS #69882
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-mac-os-x
  • Enable Expression tests for NativeAOT #69945
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm-ep] Implement EventSource counters support; add an EventPipeSessionOptions builder to TS #69567
    arch-wasm, area-System.Diagnostics-mono
  • [iOS] Remove unnecessary newline from CI script #67861
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Android] Fix app crash when using non-native HttpClientHandler #69565
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • [Android][test] Enable mandelbrot-7 on Android x64 with interp #69915
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Update CentOS7 image #69892
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add ILogWriter interface to ilc and crossgen #69609
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • More lib testing with native AOT #69132
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [draft] [wasm] JS Marshaler based on code-gen and [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Latest msquic interop #69876
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [wasm][debugger] Enabled null-conditional operator on EvaluateOnFrame #69307
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fixes #64159 - JsonSerializerContext source generation fails with keyword identifiers #66876
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, source-generator
  • [GDBJIT] Fix "section extending past end of file" warning #69124
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Added support for getting members of static structures. #69542
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix building with clang 14 #69990
    community-contribution
  • Add xarch `blsmsk` #66561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Avoid name collision for covariant and hidden properties (#63443) #63823
    area-System.Text.Json, needs-author-action
  • add architecture enum PPC64le #68809
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
